text: Nicolás Cuestas (born 8 December 1986) is a Uruguayan long distance runner who specialises in the marathon. He competed in the men's marathon event at the 2016 Summer Olympics. In 2019, he competed in the men's marathon at the 2019 World Athletics Championships held in Doha, Qatar. He finished in 55th place. His twin brother Martín also specialises in marathon. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan male long-distance runners Category:Uruguayan male marathon runners Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Uruguay Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games competitors for Uruguay Category:World Athletics Championships athletes for Uruguay
title: Nicolás Cuestas
